original_text: They are travelling to different places to tell people about Jesus Christ. They do not accept any gifts from those people who are not Christians.
korean_text: 이는 그들이 주의 이름을 위하여 나가서 이방인에게 아무 것도 받지 아니함이라

sentences.original_text: They are travelling to different places
to tell people about Jesus Christ
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들에게 예수 그리스도에 대해 알려주기 위해

sentences.original_text: They do not accept any gifts
from those people who are not Christians
